DataElement.preferredName: Off Treatment Not Death Or Progression Reason Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether or not the patient is off treatment for a reason other than death or progression.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Off Treatment Not Death Or Progression Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Off-Treatment; the phase of a protocol during which a patient does not receive treatment._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._The cessation of life._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Cancer that continues to grow or spread._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Off-Treatment; the phase of a protocol during which a patient does not receive treatment.

Concepts.definition: When a patient is not receiving therapy they are considered off treatment.  In clinical trials, a dosing schedule may require a patient to stop medication for a period of time, then resume, such as 28 days on and 7 days off.

Property.preferredName: Negation Death Or Disease Progression Reason
Property.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:The cessation of life.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Cancer that continues to grow or spread.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
A process that manifests as the worsening of a disease over time.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: justification for or explanation of the administration or cessation of therapy.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription:
Created for ABTC per request by J.Zhao. mc 3/21/12
Moved to ABTC context mc 4/7/2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the patient come off trea
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient come off treatment for a reason other than death or progression?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been removed from any immunotherapy for reasons other than progressive disease?
